description: '''Stereo MC's''' are an English [[hip-hop]] and [[electronic dance music|electronic dance]] group that formed in [[Clapham]], London, in 1985. They had an international [[Top 40|top 20]] hit with their single "[[Connected (Stereo MC's song)|Connected]]" and a UK top 20 hit with "[[Step It Up (song)|Step It Up]]". After releasing eight albums for [[Island Records]], [[!K7 Music|!K7]], Graffiti Recordings, and [[PIAS Recordings|PIAS]], they formed the label Connected with the band [[Terranova (band)|Terranova]] to release their own material and that of other artists within the house/techno/electronic genre.
